feed.title: AO3 - Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski (Filtered)
feed.subtitle: Latest works for Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski on Archive of Our Own [English, No ABO]

entry.title: Pack Scent
entry.summary:
Author: theauthoress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,024Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 447

Summary: “What’s going on?”Scott made a strange, whiny noise at the back of his throat that made him sound a little like a kicked puppy. “Your scent.” He pulled on Stiles’s hoodie until their noses were practically touching.“Scott, buddy, you’re going to have to be more specific.” Stiles rubbed a circle on the back of Scott’s hand with his thumb. “You know I don’t have werewolf senses.”“You smell like… like…” Scott fumbled for words, his brow furrowed deeply. His eyes started to look a little wet, and that was something Stiles could not deal with.“Hey, hey, it’s okay. I’m okay. Just tell me what’s wrong and we’ll fix it. I’ll—I dunno—shower really good, I promise.”“You smell like something claimed you,” Scott finally said in a horrified whisper.

entry.title: The Old Therebefore
entry.summary:
Author: Ohmickey_mat

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,329Chapters: 2/35Kudos: 28

Summary: The Hale Pack has ruled Beacon Hills for centuries, keeping it a safe haven for supernaturals—until the government tightens its grip, forcing them into an uneasy alliance with the Department of Supernatural Affairs. When a mysterious newcomer named Stiles arrives, rumored to be something even the DSA can’t explain, Derek is ordered to get close and uncover the truth. But witches are myths, whispers of a society that doesn’t exist—or so he thought. The more Derek learns, the more he realizes Stiles isn’t just a mystery… he might be his fate.

entry.title: Stasis
entry.summary:
Author: whimsicalmeerkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,398Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 163

Summary: Laura is dead, her body cut in pieces, half of it taken away by the police. Laura is dead and Derek is the alpha, so he needs Peter. No matter how much there is that will never be resolved between them and how fragile their remaining bond is, Peter is the only pack he has left.~Derek is back in Beacon Hills. Peter is the only person he has left, even if he betrayed him. Or did he?

entry.title: Trading Up
entry.summary:
Author: whimsicalmeerkat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,965Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 1,763

Summary: Stiles is turning away from the stationery store he and his (maybe) girlfriend have been looking in to follow her to the next window when she softly says “Daaaamn” and steps three feet to the side, dropping his hand in the process.Confused, he looks over and follows her eyes to a man she’s staring at with a look on her face she’s definitely never directed at Stiles.~Stiles has to watch his date flirting with the most handsome man he’s ever seen. The story ends differently than he expects.

entry.title: This Is Not Me Falling for You (Except It Definitely Is)
entry.summary:
Author: Hathly

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,754Chapters: 4/12Kudos: 86

Summary: Stiles didn’t expect to see Derek Hale at college. Not after years of teenage antagonism, not after that one summer where Derek glared at him for breathing too loud. But suddenly Derek is here—older, hotter, and somehow the only person who knows Stiles’ schedule better than his own.Now they’re kind-of-maybe friends. If friends argued over superhero rankings, walked each other to class like it’s a rom-com, and accidentally held hands under the stars.

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,062Chapters: 6/19Kudos: 205

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: Of Mucus and Men
entry.summary:
Author: LS_5Ever

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,033Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: “’m fine,” he said quickly, weakly trying to swat Derek’s arms away as the werewolf bodily lifted him like he weighed nothing and held Stiles against his chest, the younger mans face pressed into his shoulder. “Just got up too fast. I was vertical too long. It’s the gravity’s fault. That jerk.”“You almost fainted,” Derek growled, holding Stiles out in front of him, hands fluttering in the air like he wanted to touch Stiles but didn’t know where. “You’re burning up. Your heart rate spiked. You were—don’t move—”

entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,585Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 132

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: Sketchbooks
entry.summary:
Author: lennokki

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,233Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: Stiles and Derek, after three years of living together, can’t seem to find a moment to simply talk. It feels like they exist in different time zones. So Stiles brings home a sketchbook — a place for small, fleeting drawings that they can make by the hundreds if they want. And they take turns sketching things for each other.Just to survive.

entry.title: from the rooftops
entry.summary:
Author: sterek24 (mooncry89)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,746Chapters: 7/17Kudos: 281

Summary: Stiles Stilinski moved to Poland after the events of the Nogitsune. He's been away from Beacon Hills ever since. Now, several years later, he's back and he's bringing a few familiar faces with him. The Nemeton has been visiting Stiles's dreams, telling him he needs to come home - so that's what he's going to do. Oh, and he's going to rebuild the Hale Pack, too, no matter what True Alpha Scott McCall thinks about that.

entry.title: How to colossally fuck shit up
entry.summary:
Author: Cashewchococake

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,814Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 125

Summary: Derek is brought back to life by our favorite FBI-agent, Stiles Stilinski.They have sex and Derek gets pregnant.A story about Derek and Stiles building their family and trying to find their way to each other.orStiles was looking at him expectedly.Derek took a deep breath and prepared himself for the upcoming words. “But I wasn’t the only one he smelled like, Stiles.”He looked pleadingly at Stiles, who'd gone deathly pale, and was now shaking his head.“Stiles-, Eli is your son.” Derek forced out.Stiles let out a small breathless sound of “Oh!”He shot up from the couch and took his head between his hands, pulling his hair.When that didn’t help to quiet the raging flood of questions in his head, he started pacing.“What? -I mean…how? How is that even possible?""Why the hell would you keep that from me?” He was spluttering.Stiles couldn’t believe what he was hearing. Why would Derek do that?

entry.title: A Sense of Deja Vú
entry.summary:
Author: Chaos_Crew

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,036Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Seventeen years ago the Hale Pack of Beacon Hills disappears without a trace after a house fire leaving the town to believe they had all suffered the same fate as the family fifteen years prior.Hearing the news of the house fire along with the weird accounts of "freak accidents" the Winchesters and Co. head to Beacon Hills to investigate.A few hours shortly after arriving a dog with to much human like qualities leads Dean to a baby abandoned in an alley.Seventeen years later that baby has grown a lot and is starting to witness the oddities of the towns supernatural accidently ending up back in time to the point where the Hale Pack is starting to find their footing after years of butting heads.

entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,411Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 29

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.title: What You Need
entry.summary:
Author: cloudedthoughts

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,642Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 275

Summary: "I'm sorry but do you believe in Werewolves?"Or when YouTuber Stiles Stilinski is trying to find a Werewolf editor for his videos because Scott and Isaac like to flash their eyes at the camera and single father (born Werewolf) Derek might be the perfect option.
